errors.error_description: References a non-existent file 'requirements-system.txt' that users need to install dependencies from
correction_candidates: Remove the reference to requirements-system.txt and keep only the pip install command

Reference the actual dependency installation documentation
Use apt-get install or brew install commands for system dependencies
errors.golden_answer: Remove the reference to requirements-system.txt and keep only the pip install command

errors.error_description: Instructs users to install system dependencies before installing Briefcase, but doesn't specify what those dependencies are or provide the actual installation commands
correction_candidates: Provide the actual system dependency installation commands before the pip install
Move the system dependency installation after the Briefcase installation
Remove the system dependency step entirely and keep the simple pip install
Add a link to system dependency documentation instead of referencing a file
errors.golden_answer: Remove the system dependency step entirely and keep the simple pip install
